data.name: Goblin Storm - Tempest
data.detailed_description:
Tempest is the first free DLC for Goblin Storm.

Tempest focuses on the Human factions of Arcwellion. Helsatia and Westdale have been totally overhauled, and they are now joined by 4 new factions, each with unique play styles. Many new units and a brand new map Alpenheim.

New Factions:

The Oslid Kingdom
The Oslid rely upon heavy shock cavalry, including Lancers and the elite Druzina, specializing in hit and run tactics. The Oslid are powerful and mobile on the attack, but vulnerable on the defense, and afflicted by poor levies.

Duchy of Dunwall
The Duchy of Dunwall offers a lighter and more flexible alternative to the classic Kingdom of Westdale. Dunwall fields a wide selection of heavy and light infantry supported by lethal longbow men and highly defensive billhook levies. Their armies are well supported by numerous light, recon cavalry, but are chillingly deficient in heavy cavalry.

Markgravate of Nordwacht
The Markgravate of Nordwacht excels in cavalry maneuver and skirmish combat with Outrider horse archers and Jagers. When maneuver fails, they fall back on heavy defensive infantry to hold the line against the goblin onslaught.

Grand Duchy Ot훾ina
The Grand Duchy of Ot훾ina employs powerful infantry lines built around elite Battle Master regiments and supported by pavise crossbowmen. Slow, but lethal, Otcina can grind down the strongest Goblin forces in pitched field battles.

Gameplay

  • Total overhaul of combat values.
  • Overhauled levy spawn system.
  • Vastly expanded unit rosters for human factions.
  • 14 new soldier types. Ranging from swift Outriders to stalwart Battle Masters.
  • New map, Alpenheim.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP SP 3
  • Processor: 2 Ghz Intel or AMD
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 9400 GT
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 3 Ghz Intel or AMD
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 TI
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2000 MB available space
